procedures.name: Venipuncture
procedures.label: Blood Draw
procedures.description: Collection of venous blood for laboratory analysis, including pharmacokinetic (PK), pharmacodynamic (PD), clinical chemistry, hematology, serology, HbA1c, and genetic samples.

code.decode: Collection of venous blood by venipuncture

procedures.name: Urine Sample Collection
procedures.label: Urine Collection
procedures.description: Collection of urine for urinalysis, pregnancy testing, and drug screening.

procedures.name: Insulin Infusion
procedures.label: Insulin Infusion
procedures.description: Intravenous (IV) insulin infusion to induce hypoglycemia, stopped once bedside plasma glucose is <60 mg/dL.

procedures.name: Nasal Glucagon Administration
procedures.label: Nasal Glucagon Admin
procedures.description: Administration of 3 mg LY900018 via a single-use nasal dosing device.

procedures.name: Intramuscular Glucagon Administration
procedures.label: IM Glucagon Admin
procedures.description: Administration of 1 mg reconstituted intramuscular glucagon (IMG).

procedures.name: Bedside Plasma Glucose Monitoring
procedures.label: Bedside PG Monitoring
procedures.description: Monitoring of plasma glucose levels at the bedside during hypoglycemia induction and post-treatment.

procedures.name: Vital Signs Measurement
procedures.label: Vital Signs
procedures.description: Measurement of supine blood pressure, pulse rate, and body temperature at specified time points.

procedures.name: 12-lead Electrocardiogram
procedures.label: ECG
procedures.description: Recording of single and triplicate 12-lead ECGs at specified time points.

code.decode: Electrocardiogram, routine ECG with at least 12 leads; with interpretation and report

procedures.name: Physical Examination
procedures.label: Physical Exam
procedures.description: A medical examination of the patient.

procedures.name: Height and Weight Measurement
procedures.label: Height and Weight
procedures.description: Measurement of patient's height at screening and weight at specified visits.

procedures.name: Nasal Inspection
procedures.label: Nasal Inspection
procedures.description: Visual inspection of the nasal passages.

procedures.name: Injection-Site Assessment
procedures.label: Injection Site Assessment
procedures.description: Assessment of the injection site for patients receiving intramuscular glucagon (IMG).

procedures.name: Edinburgh Hypoglycemia Scale
procedures.label: Hypoglycemia Scale
procedures.description: Administration of a questionnaire to evaluate the recovery from clinical symptoms of hypoglycemia.

procedures.name: Laboratory Testing
procedures.label: Lab Tests
procedures.description: Includes clinical serology, hematology, clinical chemistry, urinalysis, HbA1c, pregnancy test, FSH, and ethanol testing.

procedures.name: Intravenous Glucose Administration
procedures.label: IV Glucose
procedures.description: Administration of IV glucose if the patient experiences signs and symptoms of severe hypoglycemia and is gauged to require intervention.

medicalDevices.name: Nasal Dosing Device
medicalDevices.label: Nasal Glucagon Device
medicalDevices.description: A user-friendly, single-use, nasal dosing device that delivers 3 mg glucagon powder for absorption through the nasal mucosa.

medicalDevices.name: Syringe and Needle
medicalDevices.label: IM Injection Kit
medicalDevices.description: Device used for intramuscular (IM) injection of reconstituted glucagon powder.

medicalDevices.name: Continuous Subcutaneous Insulin Infusion Pump
medicalDevices.label: CSII Pump
medicalDevices.description: An insulin pump for continuous subcutaneous insulin infusion.

medicalDevices.name: Intravenous Infusion Pump
medicalDevices.label: IV Pump
medicalDevices.description: Pump used for the intravenous infusion of insulin to induce hypoglycemia.

medicalDevices.name: Bedside Glucose Meter
medicalDevices.label: Glucose Meter
medicalDevices.description: Device for monitoring bedside plasma glucose (PG) levels for safety.

medicalDevices.name: 12-lead ECG Machine
medicalDevices.label: ECG Machine
medicalDevices.description: Device used to perform single and triplicate 12-lead electrocardiograms.
